verses.text: 我自己決定了，到你們那裡去的時候，不再是憂愁的。
如果我使你們憂愁，除了那因我而憂愁的人以外，誰能使我快樂呢？
我寫了這樣的信，免得我來的時候，應該使我快樂的人反而使我憂愁；我深信你們眾人都以我的喜樂為你們的喜樂。

words.note: Used to express an undesired outcome.
Often used in the structure '以 A 為 B' (take A as B).
More formal/religious than '快樂'.
Often used in the structure '以 A 為 B' (take A as B).
More formal/religious than '快樂'.

verses.text: 我從前心裡痛苦難過，流著眼淚寫信給你們，並不是要使你們憂愁，而是要你們知道我是多麼愛你們。

words.note: Emphasizes the negation.
Indicates degree.

verses.text: 饒恕犯罪的弟兄如果有人使人憂愁，他不是使我憂愁，而是使你們眾人都有一點憂愁；我只說有一點，是避免說得過分。

words.note: In a Christian context, refers to a fellow believer.

verses.text: 這樣的人受了許多人的責備，也就夠了，

words.note: Often refers to spiritual correction or strong criticism.

verses.text: 倒不如饒恕他，安慰他，免得他因憂愁過度而受不了。

words.note: A key concept in Christian theology.

verses.text: 所以，我勸你們要向他確實顯明你們的愛心。

words.note: Often used for spiritual revelation or demonstration.
Refers to compassionate and benevolent love.

verses.text: 為這緣故，我寫了那封信，要考驗你們是不是凡事都順從。

words.note: Refers to testing one's faith or obedience.
Used in biblical context to mean 'in all things'.
Highlights obedience to authority or divine will.

verses.text: 你們饒恕誰，我也饒恕誰；我所饒恕了的（如果我饒恕過甚麼），是為了你們在基督面前饒恕的，

words.note: Forms a noun phrase from a verb or verb phrase.
Turns the preceding phrase into a noun or noun phrase.
Commonly used in religious contexts to denote being before God/Christ.

verses.text: 免得撒但有機可乘，因為我們並不是不曉得他的詭計。
基督的馨香從前我為基督的福音到了特羅亞，雖然主給我開了門，

words.note: Often used metaphorically for a pleasing spiritual offering.
Lit. 'blessed news'.
Here referring to the Lord Jesus/God.

verses.text: 我心裡仍然沒有安寧，因為見不到提多弟兄。於是我辭別了那裡的人，到馬其頓去了。

words.definition: could not see, failed to meet

words.note: Often used for fellow Christians.

verses.text: 感謝　神，他常常在基督裡，使我們這些作俘虜的，列在凱旋的隊伍當中，又藉著我們在各地散播香氣，就是使人認識基督。

words.definition: to be ranked among, placed in

verses.text: 因為無論在得救的人或滅亡的人中間，我們都是基督的馨香，是獻給　神的。

words.note: Often used metaphorically for a pleasing spiritual offering.

verses.text: 對於滅亡的人，這是死亡的氣味叫人死；對於得救的人，這卻是生命的香氣使人活。這些事誰夠資格作呢？

words.note: Refers to spiritual perishing.
Can refer to physical or spiritual death.
Can refer to physical or spiritual life.

verses.text: 我們不像那許多的人，為了圖利而謬講　神的道。相反地，我們講話，是出於真誠，出於　神，是在　神面前、在基督裡的。

words.note: Verb-object compound, 'seek gain'.
Implies speaking falsely or corruptly.
Often refers to God's word/teaching.
Treat as a single adverbial phrase.
Often functions as a postposition with '在'.
